rules_text:
Ephemeral Mire enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{4}{UB}: Until end of turn, Ephemeral Mire becomes a 3/2 black and blue Horror creature until end of turn and can’t be blocked this turn. It’s still a land. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your devotion to black and blue. Activate only once each turn.
